prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: House leaders double down on impeachment positions
Description: As the Trump impeachment hearings go public, House Democrats are refining the case against the president to a simple allegation: Bribery. Meanwhile, Republicans are dismissing the testimony so far as hearsay, at best second-hand information. (Nov. 14)
No, I am not interested in articles that are political.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: I'm Sorry, But Please Do Not Put Your Purse On My Couch
Description: Welcome to my house, please drop your bag right there.
No, that article looks quite boring. I am interested more in scientific facts or celebrity gossip.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: NBA head to travel to China amid flap over pro-Hong Kong tweets
Description: Adam Silver said the NBA would not apologize for comments made by the Houston Rockets' general manager as China's main broadcaster is refusing to air two preseason games.
No, as previously stated, I do not like to read articles that are political in nature. Mention of pro-Hong Kong tweets sounds really political.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: How the world's weather is threatening popular tourist attractions
Description: Some of the world's most spectacular places are falling victim to severe weather as a result of climate change.
Yes, that sounds interesting, and the title is gripping. I just hope the article has pictures.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 3 retirement numbers you absolutely need to know
Description: These numbers can be the key to a happy and comfortable retirement.
Yes, I am interested because I think it is something that I need to know. I need to know about retirement unfortunately.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 2021 Kia Optima Raises the Style Bar for Mid-Size Sedans
Description: The new Optima looks as good as we'd hoped given the promising teaser photos.
No, I don't know enough about the differences between cars to care about any articles regarding them.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Dancing With the Stars Week 3 Recap: Who Should Go Home After Movie Night? And Who Nearly Did?
Description: Dancing With the Stars went to the movies in its third Season 28 broadcast   and like any good film, Movie Night had its fair share of plot twists.
I don't watch dancing with the stars. I only care about celebrity gossip regarding big celebrities.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: What's The Impact Of Tire Size On Tesla Vehicle Range?
Description: Range is certainly affected, but not by as much as some might think.
No because I don't care about cars.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: The 25 greatest Jimmy Stewart films
Description: He starred in countless notable films, so much so we couldn't possibly go over them all. So to save you some time, we've pared it down to the 25-best Stewart moves ever.
No because I don't know who Jimmy Stewart is.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: New York Times
Title: In Norway, the Electric Vehicle Future Has Already Arrived
Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
evaluation_results.label: no
evaluation_results.explanation: I don't know anything about cars.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: TIME Magazine
Title: Two Coronations, 70 Years Apart
Description: The Visual Parallels Between Elizabeth II and Charles III's Coronations
evaluation_results.label: yes

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: The Atlantic
Title: What Does Sentience Really Mean?
Description: The fact that AI isn’t alive doesn’t mean it can’t be sentient, the sociologist Jacy Reese Anthis argues.
evaluation_results.label: no
evaluation_results.explanation: I don't know what sentience means.
